title: Choose Your Plan
money_back: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 30 days, no questions asked.
faq_1_q: What happens when I reach my usage limits?
faq_1_a: When you reach your usage limits, you'll be prompted to upgrade to the Pro plan to continue using those features. Your limits reset at the beginning of each billing cycle.
faq_2_q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq_2_a: Yes, you can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access to Pro features until the end of your current billing period.
faq_3_q: How does the video comparison feature work?
faq_3_a: The video comparison feature allows you to input multiple YouTube video URLs and get a comprehensive analysis comparing their content, highlighting similarities, differences, and providing recommendations.
error_loading: Error loading pricing information. Please try again later.
error_checkout: Error creating checkout session. Please try again later.
